channel.title: Marian's Boring Blog
channel.description: This is probably the most boring and useless blog on the Internet. I don't think anyone should read it. There's nothing interesting here.

item.title: First Blog Post
item.description:
This looks like a new blog post...!

Maybe some bold text.

And some emphasis text.

And some code block.

Even alink to my Twitter!

This can do anything, even a red text.

And emojis ðŸŽ‰
